author: lgray
body:
This PR implements eras.phase2_hgcal and removes the HGCal customization.

You can use runTheMatrix.py to run this new era as follows (example for electron gun):

```
runTheMatrix.py -l 17.0 --command "--no_exec --conditions auto:run2_mc --era Phase2 --geometry Extended2023,Extended2023Reco"
```

In principle the "LReco" step should also work, but I have no way yet to test it.
